title: Destination: science
creator_credit: Fern Field, EPCOT Educational Media and Focal Video
brief_description: Combines animation and live action as Donald Duck is invited to tour the world of science beyond the laboratory. Flight, the electric light bulb and computers are used to illustrate the relevance of inquiry and discovery in our daily lives. Part of the series “Journey to tomorrow”.
